per_frame_init_1=i=0;  
per_frame_init_2=loop(10000, gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_3=
per_frame_init_4=i=i+1;);
per_frame_init_5=
per_frame_1=q6=aspecty;            t=t+.05/fps;    t1=t1+1/fps; 
per_frame_2=s=200+100*sin(t);      q1=t1;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=i=0;    x=0;     y=0;   p=0;   p1=0;    d=0;
per_frame_6= 
per_frame_7=loop(1024,
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=p=p+ s*(sin(i*s)-cos(i*s))/i;    p1=p1-p;
per_frame_10=x=x+sin(p1);                     y=y+cos(p1);
per_frame_11=d=d+sqrt(x*x+y*y);
per_frame_12=gmegabuf(2*i)=x;                 gmegabuf(2*i+1)=y;
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=i=i+1;);
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=///// clears the screen each n seconds
per_frame_19=n=40;                 q3=n;
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=d1=.01*(1+.5*sin(t1));
per_frame_23=d2=1024/(2.5*d);
per_frame_24=d3=1024/(2.5*d*(1+.2*sin(t1)));
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=q2=.005;     ////  d1: zoom;    d2: normalize;    d3: normalize + zoom;
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=
per_frame_30=

per_frame_33=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float3 rc = lerp(float3(0,0,0), float3(0,1,0), uv.y);
warp_4=`    uv = float2(uv.x, uv.y+0.005*rc.y);
warp_5=`        
warp_6=`
warp_7=`    float3 boxave = (GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q2,uv.y+texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_8=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q2,uv.y+texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_9=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q2,uv.y-texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_10=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q2,uv.y-texsize.w*q2)) ) / 4;
warp_11=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
warp_12=`float3 ret7=ret;
warp_13=`if(frame%3==0)ret.z=.71-ret7.x;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`    ret = cross(boxave, 1-ret)*1.2;
warp_16=`
warp_17=`if(frame%5==0)ret.x=.71-ret7.y;
warp_18=`if(frame%7==0)ret.y=.71-ret7.z;
warp_19=`    
warp_20=`    //ret -= 0.002;
warp_21=`    //ret *= 0.995;
warp_22=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - .5)*1*float2(-1,1) + .5;
comp_4=`    ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz*50, 
comp_5=`                tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz*50, 
comp_6=`                .5 
comp_7=`              ); //video echo
comp_8=`
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    ret *= 1.0; //gamma
comp_11=`    ret = ret*(1-ret)*12; //solarize
comp_12=`
comp_13=`
comp_14=`}
